dict.acceptation: 寻找，探寻；追求，谋求；往或朝…而去；[废语]考察；

sent.orig: Do you know how to conjugate the verb'seek'?
sent.trans: 你知道动词seek 应该如何变化吗？

sent.orig: Recruitment network in this area, SEEK-chi is the recruitment of "the older generation. "
sent.trans: 在网络招聘这个领域，SEEK可谓智联招聘的“前辈”。

sent.orig: Fourth, we must seek to maintain and enhance flexibility in pursuing the results we seek.
sent.trans: 第四，我们必须在力求取得这些成效时努力保持和增强灵活性。

sent.orig: Most men seek wealth, all men seek happiness.
sent.trans: 多数人追逐财富，人人寻求幸福。

sent.orig: If a man will not seek knowledge, it will not seek him.
sent.trans: 你若不去寻求知识，知识不回来找你。
